details.creator: veraPDF Consortium
details.name: ISO 14289-1:2014 - 7.18 Annotations - 7.18.1 General - Annot tag
details.description: An annotation, excluding annotations of subtype Widget, Popup or Link, shall be nested within an Annot tag

rule.description: An annotation, excluding annotations of subtype Widget, Popup or Link, shall be nested within an Annot tag
rule.test: Subtype == 'Widget' || Subtype == 'Popup' || Subtype == 'Link' || isOutsideCropBox == true || (F & 2) == 2 || structParentType == 'Annot'

error.message: %1 annotation is nested within %2 tag instead of Annot
